course_title: Fresh Sem: Africn Amer Studies: Violence and Subjection
class_notes: Why is our culture obsessed with serial killers, horror films, street fights, YouTube clips of brutality, and homicidal video games? What does violence provide for our culture. Is it possible to live without it? This course will provide an overview of contemporary theoretical approaches to violence and American culture. In particular, we will interrogate the relationship between violence and identity, subjection and Ethics, knowledge and violence, and pleasure and terror. The course will consider the theoretical difficulties of studying violence: how do we isolate it as a conceptual object? Is there anything outside of violence, or is the world itself violence? We will examine
course_description: Variable topics in African American Studies.
